dialog.Unknown Elder_t1: Greetings, traveler. I see you're new to these lands.
dialog.Me_t1: Where am I ? Who am I ?
dialog.Unknown Elder_t2: Welcome to Ethereum ! Your journey starts here.
dialog.Unknown Elder_T3: Ethereum is the one of the three worlds. A long time ago, it was a land of peace and prosperity.
dialog.Unknown Elder_T4:
The Great Wizard Vitalik, creator of the dimension, once suddently disappeared. After this tragic event, 
malicious people have taken control of the blockchain.
dialog.Me_T4: Could you help me retablish the peace here ?
dialog.Unknown Elder_T5: Well, you're in luck. I happen to know a thing or two about navigating these parts. Allow me to offer you some guidance.
dialog.Me_T5: I'd appreciate any help you can provide. What do you suggest?
dialog.Unknown Elder_T6: Have you heard of the Dash spell?
dialog.Me_T6: Dash spell? No, I haven't. What does it do?
dialog.Unknown Elder_T7: The Dash Spell allows you to slash your enemies with agility and velocity.
dialog.Me_T7: That seems very cool to me. How can I obtain it ?
dialog.Unknown Elder_T8: Well it's quite simple, just get me the Emerald Gem and I'll teach you the spell.

dialog.Degenerated Trader_t1: Hi young adventurer ! How may I help you ?
dialog.Me_t1: I'm looking for the Emerald Gem, do you know where I could find it.
dialog.Degenerated Trader_t2: If you give me 1 ETH, I'll tell you how to get it

Me_T2.Me_t1: [1] I'd rather kill myself than give a stranger 1 ETH
Me_T2.Degenerated Trader_t1: You adopted the good attitude. Never trust anybody, keep your money safe. Here is the Emerald Gem.

Me_T2.Me_t1: [2] Of course I can give you 1 ETH ! Here it is

deploy.instruction: Return the Gem to the Unknown Elder

dialog.Unknown Elder_t1: Greetings, traveler. You finally came back. Do you have what I asked to search for ?
dialog.Unknown Elder_t2:
Good ! Now, as I promised, I'll teach you the Dash spell. In order to use it, you'll have to press on [C]. 
Come on, try it !

dialog.Unknown Elder_t1: Greetings, traveler. How can I help you ?
dialog.Me_t1: I'm begging you for help to restablish the peace.
dialog.Unknown Elder_t2: Unfortunately, with my age, I'm afraid I cannot help you.
dialog.Me_T2: But how am I supposed to find the Great Sorcerer ?
dialog.Unknown Elder_T3: I suggest you to go talk to the Original Block.
dialog.Unknown Elder_T4: It is the first block ever mined. It is now exposed as a memory of the Genesis.
dialog.Me_T4: And how would it be helpful to me ?
dialog.Unknown Elder_T5: Rumour has it when you are near enough to it, it speaks to you...
dialog.Me_T5: Thanks for your help, I'll go right here.

dialog.Original Block_t1: (whispers) Come to me, come to me
